programme.title: Golden Roof Challenge 2025 - Live Delayed Part 1
programme.desc: Against the breathtaking backdrop of Innsbruck's old town, the Golden Roof Challenge 2025 returns with world-class action in the pole vault and long jump. Top athletes from all over the world compete for records on a unique mobile track

programme.title: Dare To Live Your Dream - Athlete Profil Fabian Buhl - Alpinist
programme.desc: Buhl knew he was ready to take on a new challenge - solo-redpointing. He chose to tackle the Wetterbockwand in winter via the long approach across "Wilder Freithof", a steep couloir which is extremely exposed with a high danger of avalanches.

programme.title: APP – History, Legacy and Best Moments
programme.desc: In this weeks episode we´re taking a closer Look at the APP, the association of paddleboard professionals. From the contests, to the unique trips and fascinating personalities. So, grab you boardshorts and sunglasses. Today we´re going to the beach.

programme.title: Kayak Expedition Norway "Whitewater Polar Circle"
programme.desc: Today’s episode is an exciting show about a unique kayak expedition to Norway’s white-water treasures at the Arctic Circle. Expect remote mountains, raging rivers and challenging rapids!

programme.title: Emocean - Surf Documentary
programme.desc: Today we take you on an unparalleled surf trip to some of the most famous, as well most terrifying waves on the planet. We will listen to some intimate stories of extraordinary people literally living IN and WITH the ocean.

programme.title: Alaska or Bus´t - MTB Roadtrip - Athlete Profile Andrew Taylor (USA)
programme.desc: laska has always been a dream-riding destination for 28-year-old American mountain biker Andrew Taylor. But being over 3,000 miles away from his hometown Santa Cruz, it seemed a bit too far to just jump in the truck and go.

programme.title: Golden Roof Challenge 2025 - Live Delayed Part 2
programme.desc: Against the breathtaking backdrop of Innsbruck's old town, the Golden Roof Challenge 2025 returns with world-class action in the pole vault and long jump. Top athletes from all over the world compete for records on a unique mobile track

programme.title: Chasing Dreams -Episode 6
programme.desc: A thrilling journey through Chasing Dreams, where every trail becomes a battleground for victory. From the peaks of the Basque Country to the routes of Chamonix, witness the determination of trail runners as they chase their dreams on the Golden Trail World Series.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 – Jericoacoara (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour will electrify the coast of Jericoacoara, Brazil, with competitions in its three big air divisions - TwinTip, Hydrofoil and Surfboard. A total of 57 athletes will be competing for the world championship titles at the premiere.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Kite Park League World Championships – Hood River (USA) – Best Of
programme.desc: The moment many people have been waiting for is finally here - one of the biggest kiteboarding events. While there are many great kiteboarding locations around the globe, perhaps one of the most historic is Hood River, Oregon, the birthplace of parkriding.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - stop #4 - Fieberbrunn Pro (AUT)
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 hat ihren vierten Stopp in Fieberbrunn, Österreich - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus aller Welt!

programme.title: Tankwa Trek 2020 - Koue Bokkeveld (RSA)
programme.desc: The Momentum Medical Scheme Tankwa Trek is truly a ride like no other. South Africa's premier four-day stage race takes place as one of the first UCI events of the season.

programme.title: Behind The Nines - Sölden (AUT)
programme.desc: This is a behind-the-scenes look at one of Europe's most prestigious ski and snowboard events - the Audi Nines. On the avant-garde course with new features, the laws of gravity seem to be constantly being rewritten.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - 25 Years Xtreme Verbier - Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: The Verbier Xtreme gave birth to the Freeride World Tour, the Freeride World Qualifiers and the Freeride Junior Tour and sparked an international wave of competitive freeriding.

programme.title: 4634 Perception - The Mountain Within
programme.desc: Monte Rosa: the highest mountain range in Switzerland with the Dufourspitze, its highest peak, at 4,634m in altitude, is home to the longest mountain pass in the Alps: the Marinelli. It also harbours a dream... Géraldine Fasnacht’s dream.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2018 - Womens Climbing Part 1 - Female Climbing Heroes -
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2018 - Cape Epic Documentary
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2018 - Trans Angeles - MTB - Los Angeles _USA_
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: Athlete Profile Jeremie Heitz
programme.desc: Freeriding: breathtaking pictures of an exceptional talent and an unique project!Athlete Profile Jérémié Heitz

programme.title: WOF 2024 #21: Škoda Titan Desert Series - Morocco
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesport and the mystic deserts of Morocco, where Athletes are not only fighting nature, but also one of the hardest racetracks on the planet. The dunes… The navigation…. The suffering… The legend…. The desert! The Skoda Titan Desert Morocco.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #22: 4Islands - Croatia
programme.desc: 4Islands MTB Croatia will welcome over 370 mountain bikers from all over the world for a five-day race on four Croatian islands. This year the order of the islands will be slightly different, starting with Krk, Cres, Lošinj and ending on Rab.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #27: World E-Bike Series Round #1 & #2
programme.desc: Welcome from WES Round 1 and 2 in Trentino, Alto Garda, for the UCI E-MTB XC World Cup Season Opener. First time ever in the astonishing Dolomites mountain area in northern Italy, well-known for its tradition in e-biking, MTB and cyclo-tourism.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #38: Ötztal Cycle Marathon (AUT)
programme.desc: The Ötztal Cycle Marathon 2024 in Austria, taking place on the 1st of September, is the most challenging cycling marathon in the Alps, offering a captivating mix of valley and high alpine terrain. The course spans 227 kilometers and over 4,000 participants.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 1
programme.desc: Anniversary base camp / Jungfraujoch (Switzerland)On 3 August 2011, exactly 200 years after the first ascent, the Swiss mountain sports outfitter Mammut will be organizing the biggest summit project in the history of mountaineering on the “Top of Europe”...

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 3 - Cerro Kishtwar
programme.desc: Mammut 150 Peaks Project: Cerro KishtwarKashmir, India, holds some of the world’s most spectacular and mystical mountains. Now with special permissions, an European team will attempt to climb the most aesthetic one of all, Cerro Kishtwar.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 4 - Italy & Norway
programme.desc: 150 summit projectTwo speed flyers were the first to climb Mount Etna (ITA) with paragliders and skis. Another exciting ski tour was undertaken by Scandinavian sportswomen who climbed Geitgaljen in the Lofoten Islands (NOR) in April 2012.

programme.title: FIA World Championship - South African Safari Rally
programme.desc: The South African Safari Rally 2025, which is part of the FIA World Rally-Raid Championship (W2RC), took place from May 18 to 24 in Sun City, South Africa. The rally covers 2,600 km through rugged terrain, picturesque savannahs and challenging off-road stages.

programme.title: FIA - Pure Motorsport "Documentary | The Restart"
programme.desc: Covid-19 brought the world of motorsport to a complete standstill. However, this standstill was overcome through the joint effort and passion of volunteers, promoters, teams, drivers and FIA officials. They managed the successful RESTART.

programme.title: F3 Asian Championship - Season Wrap Up 2021
programme.desc: In todays Episode we got something for the Motorsports enthusiasts. Earlier this year the Formula 3 Asian Championship took place in the united Arabian emirates an we´re going to have a closer look at what was going on, in our season Wrap Up.

programme.title: Open Faces 2025 - YETI Freeride Junior World Championships Kappl/Paznaun - LIVE Part 1
programme.desc: Open Faces 2025 - YETI Freeride Junior World Championships Kappl/Paznaun - LIVE Part 1

programme.title: WOF 2025 #33: World Downhill Skateboarding Championships - Erzincan (TUR)
programme.desc: The second round of the Downhill Skateboarding World Championship took place under sunny skies high up on Mount Ergan Dağı in Erzincan, Turkey. This was the third visit to the 3 km long track, often referred to as the most difficult in the world.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #34: Mystic Skate Cup - 30 Years Anniversary
programme.desc: The Mystic Sk8 Cup is one of the largest skateboarding competitions in Europe, attracting top skateboarders from around the world. For almost three decades, the biggest stars such as David Gonzalez, Dustin Dollin, Christian Hosoi and Tony Hawk have been competing

programme.title: WOF 2025 #35: LENA
programme.desc: In this episode of “World of Freesports,” we accompany Lena Kenma as she takes on one of the biggest challenges of her surfing career: her first attempt to conquer the legendary giant waves of Nazaré.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #36: Red Bull Romaniacs 2025
programme.desc: The Red Bull Romaniacs 2025, which took place in Romania from July 22 to 26, celebrated its 22nd edition under the motto “Game Changer.” The event began with the traditional city prologue before four grueling days of off-road racing pushed the riders to their limits.

programme.title: Episode 41
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 41

programme.title: Dani Arnold - Ice Climbing at Lake Baikal
programme.desc: Swiss extreme sportsman Dani Arnold went on a challenging expedition to the deepest lake on earth - Lake Baikal. The Siberian winter provided accordingly difficult and fascinating conditions.

programme.title: Trans Hong Kong - A Urban MTB Adventure (HKG)
programme.desc: The urban mountain bike adventure series combines rides in some of the world's largest cities. In this episode we cycle through the Hong Kong region with none other than Hans “no way” Rey, the grandfather of mountain bike freeriding.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 2 - USA
programme.desc: The Swiss mountaineering company Mammut is celebrating its 150th anniversary with the largest summit project in history: 150 summit ascents are being organized worldwide as part of the “150 Peaks Project”.

programme.title: Golden Roof Challenge 2025 - Live Delayed Part 2
programme.desc: Against the breathtaking backdrop of Innsbruck's old town, the Golden Roof Challenge 2025 returns with world-class action in the pole vault and long jump. Top athletes from all over the world compete for records on a unique mobile track

programme.title: Profile Marcel Remy - On top of Miroir de l´Argentine
programme.desc: It is his favorite route: the 450 meter north-west face of the famous Miroir de l’Argentine. For more than the 200th time, Marcel Remy, father of Yves and Claude Remy, climbs this classic peak with his sons on August 22, 2017. At the age of 94.

programme.title: Trans Napoli - A Mountain Bike Expedition Naples (ITA)
programme.desc: TransNapoli is an urban MTB adventure led by legendary mountain bike pioneer Hans Rey. It is a colorful five-day tour that crosses the Amalfi and Naples regions of Italy on mountain bikes and e-bikes.

programme.title: Climbing Special - Worldwide
programme.desc: Kashmir, the Moab Desert, the famous Matterhorn, icefalls in Norway and Patagonia. We look back on breathtaking adventures, incredible alpine records and never-before-imagined new ascents

programme.title: Expedition Antarctica - Caro North - Antarctic
programme.desc: Ice climbing, ski mountaineering and days of sailing on open waters through the infamous Drake Passage: 28-year-old extreme athlete Caro North set off for a four-week expedition to the far south of our continent.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Big Air Kite & GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships - Gran Canaria (ESP)
programme.desc: Gran Canaria will host the GKA Big Air Kite World Championships and the GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships in July 2024. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the titles and show impressive skills in kiteboarding and wingfoiling.

programme.title: Episode 41
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 41

programme.title: Selma
programme.desc: This adventure from the Edge of the World tells the amazing story of the crew of Polish yacht “Selma Expeditions”, and their voyage to the most challenging waters in the world. 11 crewmembers take on the heroic challenge of reaching The Bay of Whales in the Antarctic.

programme.title: FIA Championship Middle East - Saudi Baja Hall
programme.desc: The Saudi Baja is an important event in the FIA Middle East Baja Cup series. It takes place from January 30 to February 1, 2025 and serves as the opening round of the FIA World Cup for Cross-Country Bajas and the FIM Bajas World Cup.

programme.title: Defender GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sylt (GER) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Stopover of the kite surfing discipline on the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour in Sylt, Germany. The Defender GKA Kite World Cup Sylt is held in two disciplines - Kite-Surf and Hydrofoil Big Air.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Elena Moreno
programme.desc: Cape Verde is hosting the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the best kitesurfers in the world like Elena Moreno. From breathtaking freestyle tricks to impressive racing moments, her determination and talent are on display.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - stop #5 - Grand Finale - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 hat ihr großes Finale in Xtreme Verbier, Schweiz - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus aller Welt!

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic 2020 - Documentary - Western Cape (RSA)
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic 2020 TV highlight show shows how amateurs and professionals are reacting to the cancellation of this year's race due to the growing coronavirus pandemic. You look back on last year's race and relive the key moments

programme.title: The legend of Muksu river - Tajikistan
programme.desc: This is a journey to the Silk Road in Central Asia into the adventurous world of canoeing. The Muksu in Tajikistan is one of the three most difficult rapids here. Once immersed in the river, there is no turning back.

programme.title: Best of Ultra-Trail du Mont-Blanc (FRA)
programme.desc: The Ultra Trail du Mont Blanc – an extraordinary adventure in the middle of the Mont Blanc massif in Italy, France and Switzerland. In total, the athletes cover a distance of 170 kilometers.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf & Hydrofoil Big Air World Cup - Sylt (GER)
programme.desc: Sylt is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf & Hydrofoil Big Air World Cup 2024, which brings together the best riders in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in wave riding and big air hydrofoiling.

programme.title: GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup - Dunkerque (FRA)
programme.desc: Dunkerque is the venue for the GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. Athletes from all over the world compete for the title and show impressive tricks, power moves and technical skills.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup & GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Dakhla (MAR)
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup and the GWA Wingfoil World Cup in Dakhla, Morocco, bring together the best kite surfers and wingfoilers in the world. The riders show off their technical skills and innovation in the wave riding disciplines.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Ibiraquera (BRA)
programme.desc: Ibiraquera in Brazil is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in wave riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #44: World Rowing Beach Sprint Finals 2023
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge haben wir ein besonderes Format der World Rowing Tour. In Barletta, Italien, finden die Beach Sprint Finals von 2023 statt. Auf dem Mittelmeer kämpfen die Athleten um den Titel des diesjährigen Champions. Schauen wir mal rein!

programme.title: WOF 2023 #45: Titan Desert Series 2023 - Almería (ESP)
programme.desc: Der Škoda Titan Desert Almería ist viel mehr als ein MTB-Rennen. Es ist ein viertägiges Abenteuer, mit ständigen sportlichen und persönlichen Herausforderungen. Ein einzigartiges Erlebnis, bei dem man seine Grenzen auf dem Bike messen und Erfahrungen mit dem Rest des Titan Camps teilen kann.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #46: GKA Kitesurfing World Tour - The Stars of Wave
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge ist es wieder Zeit für die GKA Kitesurfing World Tour 2023. Nachdem wir bereits das Highlight der Kitesurfing Freestyler gesehen haben, gehen wir nun zu den Kite-Surf Wave Athleten über und rekapitulieren das Highlight der ersten Saisonhälfte. Let's check out!

programme.title: WOF 2023 #47: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Geneva (SUI)
programme.desc: Heute besuchen wir die wunderschöne Stadt Genf in der Schweiz für die European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023. Auf dem atemberaubenden "Lac Leman" zeigen einige der besten Windsurfer der Welt ihr Können in den Disziplinen Foilstyle und Tow-In. Schauen wir uns ein bisschen Wasser-Action an!

programme.title: Profile Marcel Remy - On top of Miroir de l´Argentine
programme.desc: It is his favorite route: the 450 meter north-west face of the famous Miroir de l’Argentine. For more than the 200th time, Marcel Remy, father of Yves and Claude Remy, climbs this classic peak with his sons on August 22, 2017. At the age of 94.

programme.title: iQFOiL U23 World Championships - Live delayed Part 1

programme.desc: The Freestyle Pro Tour 2025 stops off at the beautiful island of Paros in Greece. Crystal clear water, steady meltemi winds, and the breathtaking backdrop of the Aegean Sea set the stage for the world's best freestyle windsurfers.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - WOF 2025 _38_ World Downhill Skateboarding Champio
programme.desc: The Downhill Skateboarding World Championships on the Isle of Man bring the world's fastest riders to one of the most challenging courses. In the “Stand Up Men” category, you can expect pure speed, fiercely contested races, and breathtaking descents.

programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 39

programme.title: One Water Race 2025 - Road to Compilation
programme.desc: Follow the world’s top ultra-athletes as they prepare for the ultimate endurance test – the One Water Race. This highlight reel captures the best moments from six episodes, showcasing their struggles, victories, and relentless pursuit of greatness.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #39: GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup France
programme.desc: GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup France - Dunkerque (FRA)Welcome to World of Freesports…and Bienvenue to France. The famous beaches of the french Harbour-city are once again home to GKA Kitesurfers. This Episode we will have a look at happend there on and of the water.

programme.title: Trans Hong Kong - A Urban MTB Adventure (HKG)

programme.title: Golden Trails World Series - Final Himalaya (NPL)
programme.desc: Each of the series' six races has been specifically chosen for its scenery, challenge, history and atmosphere. Runners must compete in at least 3 of the 6 qualifying races and finish in the top 11 to be invited to the finals.

programme.title: Silk Way Rally - Russland/Mongolei/China

programme.title: Gordon Bennett Cup 2024 - Münster (GER)
programme.desc: The Coupe Aéronautique Gordon Bennett, the FAI long-distance world championship for gas balloon pilots, is the oldest and most prestigious event in aviation and the ultimate challenge for pilots. Goal is to cover the greatest distance to the launch site without stopping

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)

programme.desc: The Cauipe lagoon is the venue for the Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. The Brazilian paradise offers the perfect playground for explosive tricks.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - 25 Years Xtreme Verbier - Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: The Verbier Xtreme gave birth to the Freeride World Tour, the Freeride World Qualifiers and the Freeride Junior Tour and sparked an international wave of competitive freeriding.

programme.title: The legend of Muksu river - Tajikistan
programme.desc: This is a journey to the Silk Road in Central Asia into the adventurous world of canoeing. The Muksu in Tajikistan is one of the three most difficult rapids here. Once immersed in the river, there is no turning back.

programme.desc: Gran Canaria will host the GKA Big Air Kite World Championships and the GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships in July 2024. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the titles and show impressive skills in kiteboarding and wingfoiling.

programme.desc: Matthias Haunholder and Matthias Mayr present a big mountain freeski film, primarily shot in Austria. Through stunning ski footage and heartfelt interviews, the film explores the intense emotions of parents and loved ones as they cope with the risks faced by the skiers.

programme.title: 10 Years Laax Open
programme.desc: The Laax Open is one of the most prestigious snowboard events, celebrating its 10th anniversary this year. Against the backdrop of the Swiss Alps, the Laax Open offers a unique blend of energetic sport and lively après-ski culture.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 2 - USA
programme.desc: The Swiss mountaineering company Mammut is celebrating its 150th anniversary with the largest summit project in history: 150 summit ascents are being organized worldwide as part of the “150 Peaks Project”.

programme.title: Monster Energy Supercross Geneva
programme.desc: The Monster Energy Supercross Geneva, a must-attend event at the end of the year, brings together several international riders on one of the largest indoor tracks in Europe. As a major sporting event in Switzerland, it has welcomed around 30,000 spectators in almost 35 editions.

programme.title: Coldwater Classic Series 2010 - Documentary
programme.desc: The Cold Water Classic events feature $15,000 for the winner of each event and $50,000 for the series winner. The Cold Water Classic is the first series of its kind and takes place in some of the world's rougher surf spots.

programme.title: Trans Hong Kong - A Urban MTB Adventure (HKG)
programme.desc: The urban mountain bike adventure series combines rides in some of the world's largest cities. In this episode we cycle through the Hong Kong region with none other than Hans “no way” Rey, the grandfather of mountain bike freeriding.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 2 - USA
programme.desc: The Swiss mountaineering company Mammut is celebrating its 150th anniversary with the largest summit project in history: 150 summit ascents are being organized worldwide as part of the “150 Peaks Project”.

programme.title: Outdoorsportsteam Paragliding - The Dream of Flight
programme.desc: We take you into the sky and accompany a paragliding virtuoso to the Mont Blanc massif, the Atacama Desert in Chile and the Greek island of Santorini. Follow French paraglider pilot Jean-Baptiste Chandelier.

programme.title: Dani Arnold - Ice Climbing at Lake Baikal
programme.desc: Swiss extreme sportsman Dani Arnold went on a challenging expedition to the deepest lake on earth - Lake Baikal. The Siberian winter provided accordingly difficult and fascinating conditions.

programme.title: Simple Session 2025 - Skate Finals MEN
programme.desc: Simple Session is back at Unibet Arena in Tallinn, Estonia – celebrating its massive 25-year anniversary! A quarter-century of mind-blowing BMX riding and skateboarding, unforgettable moments, and a global community of athletes pushing the limits.Hoppla!

programme.title: WOF 2023 #48: WES World E-Bike Series #6 & #7
programme.desc: WES ist die erste Weltmeisterschaft, die nur für E-Bikes bestimmt ist, der einzige UCI-E-Mountainbike-Cross-Country-Weltcup, zu dem auch das E-Bike-Fest, gehört. Es handelt sich um ein Doppelrennen an einem Wochenende mit einem Rundkurs von 3 bis 4 km Länge.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #49: Titan Desert Series 2023 - Neom (KSA)
programme.desc: Die NEOM Titan Desert Saudi-Arabien macht ihrem mächtigen Namen alle Ehre. Bei diesem Ausdauer- und Orientierungsrennen für Mountainbiker, das durch die bergige Wüste von NEOM führt, müssen die Fahrer in vier intensiven Etappen um den Sieg kämpfen.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #50: Profile Marko Grilc
programme.desc: Diese Folge widmen wir dem legendären Snowboarder Marko Grilc. Sei dabei, wenn wir das Leben und die Leistungen dieser Ikone der Snowboardwelt feiern. Macht euch bereit für eine herzliche Reise durch das bemerkenswerte Vermächtnis von Marko Grilc.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #51: Winter Games New Zealand - Big Air Team Challenge
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge besuchen wir die aufregenden Winterspiele 2023 mit der Big Air Team Challenge! Seien Sie dabei, wenn die Freestyle-Skifahrer und Snowboarder ihr Können auf spektakuläre Weise unter Beweis stellen!

programme.title: 5 Peaks in One Day - Mountaineering
programme.desc: Zermatt, Switzerland - Swiss alpinist Andreas Steindl (26) has accomplished what most people deem impossible: he ran 30.66 kilometres from Zermatt to Saas Fee crossing five 4000m peaks. in only 7 hours, 45 minutes and 44 seconds.

programme.desc: The Trans Madeira combines the best that Madeira Island and Porto Santo have to offer with six days of racing in the most diverse terrain in the world! With the addition of a new island, you can expect 250km of riding and more than 30 special stages

programme.title: 2025 WES UCI E-MTB XC World Cup Cheile Grădiștei Round
programme.desc: The WES UCI E-MTB XC World Cup 2025 - Cheile Grădiștei Round marks the exciting start to the season of the world's leading e-mountain bike series. Riders from all over the world will be battling for the first points in the championship standings

programme.title: World Downhill Skateboarding Championships Round 1 - Axamer Lizum (AUT)
programme.desc: The Downhill Skateboarding World Championships in Axamer Lizum, Austria, kicked off the 2025 season from June 13 to 15. The course on the steep and technically demanding 3.3 km Hoadlstraße featured tight hairpin turns, long straights, and gradients of up to 21.8%, providing ideal conditions for high-speed racing and overtaking maneuvers.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Prologue Day
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.desc: The Laax Open is one of the most prestigious snowboard events, celebrating its 10th anniversary this year. Against the backdrop of the Swiss Alps, the Laax Open offers a unique blend of energetic sport and lively après-ski culture.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 13, Jordan
programme.desc: Ten of the world’s strongest men gathered in Amman to compete in Jordan’s first-ever Truck-Pull Championship. The contestants race against the clock while pulling a 21-ton truck across the track. One of the most fierce competitors to take part in the event was four-time winner of the World’s Strongest Man competition, Brian Shaw.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 14, Greece
programme.desc: Taking place in Corinth, Greece, considered by many the cradle of the sports competition games, an epic strongman battle will mark the last stage before the upcoming big two-day season’s finale in Chetumal, Mexico. In front of more than 5000 spectators, the twelve athletes compete in Log Lifts, Card Deadlift, Conan’s Wheel and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E15 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 15, Mexico World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first day of the two-part finale sees the strongest men competing in Carry and Drag, Dumbbell Lift and the Truck Pull. Everything is possible in this heated fight for the crown against the backdrop of stunning Chetumal, Mexico.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E16 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 16, Mexico World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: On the second day of the grand finale of the 2017 Strongman Champions League, the athletes have a last chance to secure the medals in the spectacular four events Weight for Height, Deadlift Cars, Forward Hold and The Loading Medley. Be prepared for stunning performances – and even world records!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 1, Norway - World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: Season 2018 begins with 14 strongest men in the world, all competing for the title. The competition kicks off in Norway. We’ll see typical Viking disciplines, team events and world records in heavy conditions in the land of snow and ice. They will suffer, they will freeze and fight in this first competition of the year for the title that they will carry on their shoulders throughout whole year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 2, Germany - FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capichampions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2018 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 3, Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the first time in history, Strongman Champions League will set up competition in Abu Dhabi. The line-up of super athletes, who are part of the SCL, includes former world champions Dainis Zageris (Latvia) & Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland), current world champion Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and biggest strongman in the World Sean O’Hagan (Ireland).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Strongman classic in land where there is no place for anything else excepts strength, fight and endurance. Here are fourteen of the strongest men, fighting for the title of strongest in Holland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: We go back to Holland, where former champion Dainis Zageris is in leading position after the first three events. Alongside Radzikowski, he is in this moment favorite for world title, and also leader shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 6, Finland
programme.desc: Stage six of Strongman champions league, 2018 is set back on north, in Finland. Here we have Matjaz Belsak, wearing SCL leader shirt, one of the biggest strongman in the World Mika Torro, fan favorite strongman in all over the World – Will Baggott, and also big name from Baltic – Aivars Smaukstelis

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: Twelve strongman, including defending Worldchampion Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia , will compete on “Air spa” for the title of best in homeland country of Tesla, Pupin, Novak Djokovic. Matjaz Belsak is the SCL leader in this competition, chasing his third victory this season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 8, Finland - U105 (Part 1)
programme.desc: The World championship in lightweights of the Strongman Champions League bring to us 50 strongmen from all over the world. All athletes are under 105 kilograms and for them this is the step up to the ultimate heavyweights.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 9, Finland - U105 (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this second stage of the World championship of lightweights we will find out who out of the 12 athletes will win the title in the under 105 kilogram category.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 10, Romania (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of SCL Romania 2018 will be hosted in Brasov. This episode features a new event for Strongman Champion League: “ The Chopper Pull”!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 11, Romania (Part 2)
programme.desc: After three classical Strongman events – Dead lift, Loading and Front hold – and one historical, Chopper Pull for the first time in history of Strongman, now we go to find out who will take title in Romania. This is the second stage in Romania and it remains to be seen who will win the title; Aivars, Travis or Krzyzstof?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 12, Curacao (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next destination of Strongman Champions League is in a piece of paradise on earth – Curacao. We bring to you some special Strongman events like the Rock Lift, Tug of War and Weight for Height in this episode.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 13, Curacao (Part 2)
programme.desc: This is the last competition before the grand finals. After the first three events Zageris is in top place, but can O’Hagan, Baggott, Petursson and Ortmayer step into the final? Last chance some of them will find through events like Forward Hold, Truck Pull, Dead Lift and loading very big objects.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 14, Road to Mexico
programme.desc: We bring you 50 minutes of Strongman inside. Fears, inspiration, courage, the best and worst from our finalists and their expectation of the finals. We also go to Poland and Germany to represent one day in the training of Krzysztof Radzikowski and Dennis Kohlruss. See all the finalists for Mexico in their comfort zone here, with their backgrounds /motivations /family and friends.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 15, Mexico - World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of the Strongman Champions League 2018 finals in Mexico. The last twelve athletes all pushing their boundaries and testing their limits to take the World title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 16, Mexico - World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: After 11 months and 14 competitions all over the world, it all comes down to the final in this episode. The strongmen must show their best skills and every mistake is expensive, so their concentration must be at the highest possible level. Will Krzysztof manage to take off back or will Dainis maintain his lead?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 1, World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: This year 14 athletes from all over the world came to Fefor to compete in 6 cruel events. We'll see typical Viking disciplines on very heavy conditions in land of snow and ice, World records and athletes like the title defender Krzysztof Radzikowski, strongest guys from Holland and Germany and many more

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 SCL S6 Ep2 FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capita in the World and of course, the most powerful host in Strongman champions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2019 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 3, Turkey
programme.desc: On a spectacular beach in Alanya, the MLO Strongman Champions League Turkey was viewed by thousands of spectators over a two day battle. With 12 athletes at the start over 6 cruel events, like Marble Stone Lift, Truckpull and Deadlift cars. And with the comeback of Travis Ortmayer / USA, former stone king and world ranked competitor. Winner of several SCL stages in the past.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Four times Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter competing here in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, and 3 in this episode: The first event, a truckpull of 17.000 kg over 25 meters in max 75 seconds, was a real hard pull Also for the World Champion Truckpull, Holland’s runner-up Kelvin de Ruiter, but watch his amazing technique here.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter, competing in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, 3 in this second episode; a Viking-press of 150 kg with the current world record holder Luke Herrick. The fifth event, a front hold of 25 kg is loved or hated by the athletes and lastly, the Stones of Strength.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 6, Russia
programme.desc: An unbelievable TANK PULL of 50.000 kg was at the stage of SCL RUSSIA. Never seen this before! Not only a tank pull was done here but also the Viking Press/ Deadlift Max and Log lift reps were spectacular events to see here in Russia. With Mikhail Koklyaev also as event presenter, the former top 3 world strongest man from Russia was there

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E07 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: In this year’s edition on The Balkan Peninsula, we have competing the new talent from Estonia Marko Remlik together with Sebastian Kurek from Poland and yellow leader Kelvin de Ruiter

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland and Aivars Smaukstelis from Latvia are the strongman future of these days. Mateusz is the best man in the World at the moment to defeat. Only 25 years and such a fantastic strongman. They come here only for a win. But there are 12 more Strong athletes in this episode who want the title of Finland as well.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E09 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Mateusz Is leading after day 1 (previous episode) with close behind him Aivars Smaukstelis and Zake Muluzi from the UK. All very exciting! 5 events in this episode: Log Lift, Fram Walk, Deadlift, Sack Throw (Weight for Height), Loading medley.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E10 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 10, Portugal
programme.desc: In this stage we have a new strong debutant: Oleg Sylka from the Ukraine. He is the new talent, who will stand up against the old champions like ZSydrunas Savickas and Brian Shaw and the Stoltman Brother from the UK. This new talent Oleg is a great character and we will see him flame in the episode in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E11 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 11, Callio
programme.desc: In Callio is the deepest mine of Europe/ 1500 meter deep, whereas the MLO Strongman Champions League also did 1 event. The Forward Hold, on a 1500 dept/ also a kind of new record/ as it was never done before. Spectacular and new in Strongman sport.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E12 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 12, Ukraine
programme.desc: Kelvin de Ruiter is here to defend his SCL World Truck Pull Championships title. But this year, another strong field wants his title. Over 3 different pulls with 3 different trucks, and 14 athletes at the start, it will be difficult for everybody.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E13 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 13, Caribbean
programme.desc: SCL edition Curacao 2019 was a great event, twelve power boys from all over made a great show at the white beaches, and 35 degrees Celsius heat in the Carrabean Islands. Two events were held on Friday at the beach of beautiful resort Sunscape, the other three were held near the world famous floating bridge at Willemstad on Saturday night.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E14 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 14, Dubai
programme.desc: Hosted at Meydan Grandstand in Dubai, the Strongman Champions League had some really big names in the list like Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland, Brian Shaw from the USA and Krzysztof Radzikowski. In front of the Burj Khalifa the athletes do the deadlift max and 4 other heavy events at another spot in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E15 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. The last stage over 2 episodes of the MLO Strongman Champions League, were held in Porto, Portugal. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E16 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results and this is the final!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: The spectacular Fefor Arena hosted for the 8th time the Worlds Strongest Viking, part of the SCL World Series. But with the absence of former title holders its anyones game. Again, a very spectacular episode of the Strongman Champions League here in Norway.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 2, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: In this episode, the Titan, former double World champion from Latvia will compete against his fellow countryman and the current World champion - Aivars Smaukstelis. With 8 events over 2 stages the contestants are pushed to their limits in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 3, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Dainis Zageris and Aivars Smaukstelis, both from Latvia have a serious, strong battle in the this second and final episode of the SCL Finland 2020. Watch the unbelievable and brute power of these athletes in the last 4 events to crown the winner.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 4, World Record Breakers
programme.desc: The SCL Germany event takes place in an ancient castle called Die Burg in the heart of Germany. Its here where 5 world record attempts take place across 5 different events with 10 athletes. They will go to the max! See this and much more in the SCL Germany 2020.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 5, Strongest Viking
programme.desc: SCL Norway is normally all about snow, wind, and cold weather. Our brave athletes are used to compete under conditions few other athletes have competed in, but after COVID delays the competition has been moved from winter to summer bringing in a whole new range of challenges. With an impressive athlete list who will be the winner across 5 cruel events?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 6, World Strongest Team 1
programme.desc: Were in sunny Finland for the next stage of a double-bill of SCL action, but this time its a team event. A truly fantastic event with 6000 spectators. Even during COVID times this was exceptional! 8 Strong Teams where fighting for the title over a crazy 9 events.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 7, World Strongest Team 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland, done over 9 cruel events. In this episode the last and final 5 events take place. 8 Strong Teams are fighting for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 8, Portugal
programme.desc: The next set of challenges are set in sunny Esposende in Portugal. With stars such as Travis Ortmayer, Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland, and Ervin Toots from Estonia. While Fabio Silva will defend the honour in his own country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E09 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 9, World Records (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are back in Germany, with the world record breakers. We promise you this is going to be amazing. Do not move from that seat, because we are going to see some records smashed today. Over 6 cruel events, you will see who gets crowned of the King Of The Castle!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E10 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 10, World Records (Part 2)
programme.desc: With the next episode of Strongman Champions League Germany. Its the world record breakers, and in the last show we set two new records. Can more be records be broken before the king of the castle is crowned?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E11 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 11, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 1)
programme.desc: Welcome to Kokkola in Finland. This city will be the setting for the Lightweight World championship. Out of 24 athletes, only 16 will make it through to the final day, but who will champion each event and who is going to be eliminated?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E12 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 12, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 2)
programme.desc: Its the second day, and the top 16 athletes have made it through to the final round. With another 4 events to go who will get the crown of world champion?

programme.title: Curiel vs. Nontshinga (2024)
programme.desc: A huge rematch takes place in the light flyweight division, as Curiel and Nontshinga collide in Mexico.

programme.desc: A British fan-favorite returned to action, as Derek 'War' Chisora met Gerald Washington in London.

programme.title: Toler vs. Panin (2024)
programme.desc: Toler and Panin both boast identical 17-1-0 records as the two welterweights clash in Houston.

programme.title: Hrgovic vs. McKean (2023)

programme.desc: Four headliners take part in an epic 'survivor tag' match that left fans stunned in Nashville.

programme.title: Curiel vs. Pennington (2023)
programme.desc: Raul Curiel (12-0) put his unbeaten record on the line against the experienced Courtney Pennington (17-6-3).

programme.title: Diaz vs. Perez (2024)
programme.desc: JoJo Diaz Jr. fights for the first time in 2024 as he comes up against Ricky Perez in California.

programme.title: Allen vs. Makhmudov

programme.title: Barriere vs. Vianello

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 103: Last Heavyweight Standing main event features Levi Rigters (19-3, 9 KO) colliding with Jamal Ben Saddik (38-10, 29 KO) to see who moves on in the tournament. Among the other names taking part in Phase Two are Nabil Khachab (29-6-1, 4 KO), Iancu Ionut (31-11, 13 KO), Rade Opacic (21-7, 16 KO), Milos Cvjeticanin (13-4, 9 KO), Sofian Laidouni (39-5-1, 20 KO), and many more. In addition, Chico Kwasi (44-5-2, 23 KO) will defend his GLORY welterweight world title against Mehdi Ait El Hadj (35-4-2, 8 KO), Mory Kromah (34-3-1, 20 KO) returns and takes on Cristian Ristea (44-26, 13 KO) in a heavyweight match-up outside the tournament, and Tayfun Ozcan (88-11-3, 28 KO) clashes with rival...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Former Light Heavyweight Champion Tarik Khbabez (52-12-1, 22 KO) and Bahram Rajabzabeh (72-5, 63 KO) collide in a huge showdown for the vacant Light Heavyweight title. The penultimate round of the Last Heavyweight Standing tournament resumes with eight heavyweights competing in two separate four-man one-night tournaments. Notable participants include Levi Rigters (20-3, 10 KO), Nabil Khachab (30-6-1, 4 KO), Rade Opacic (22-7, 17 KO) and Milos Cvjeticanin (14-4, 9 KO).

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Antonio "Junior" Silva has dominated every one of his fights. Eric Pele may be the underdog, but he's riding his own winning streak. It's an earthquake when a 32-pound unstoppable force meets a 300-pound unmovable object. Roger Gracie is already at the top of the heap in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and submission wrestling, now he's fighting MMA for the first time. He puts his reputation on the line as he faces Ron Waterman.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: A well-known name on the Russian MMA circuit, this fight is Martin Malhosyan's first chance at North American exposure. Stopping this dangerous fighter won't be easy, but Mike Patt's devastating submission win from series 1 proves he's ready. Wisniewski's development as a fighter was a family affair, as he and his brother watched tapes of MMA battles then trained in the front yard. Oganov honed his skills in Serbia, while enrolled in the Red Army.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Namaste England
programme.desc: Param is besotted with Jasmeet when he watches her dance during a Dussehra celebration. An ambitious Jasmeet wishes to be a jewellery designer, but her father and brother discourage her. They even agree to wed her off to Param, who doesn't want her to work after marriage. Once they get married, Jasmeet tries to coax Param to get UK citizenship even if it means resorting to illegal means. But Param is a man of principles and rejects her ideas. Unknown to him, Jasmeet comes up with a risky plan to fulfill her ambitions.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E85 Jodha Akbar S3 E85
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.desc: Jun-pyo plans to evict his best friend and Jan Di out of Shinhwa High School and out of the group, F4.

programme.desc: Jan Di rushes to the hospital after hearing that Jun-Pyo had been in an accident.

programme.desc: Yi-jung receives a hysterical call from his mother threatening to commit suicide because of his father.

programme.desc: Madam Kang drops in unexpectedly on the Geum family.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Two years later, things have gotten worse: Warren's apocalyptic dreams continue while the group fights MAD-Zs.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing the Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group is reunited with old Native friends who are defending a dam that controls Newmerica's water from talkers. In order to help, Doc and Warren undertake spiritual journeys.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.
